channel.title: Events on Chattanooga Democratic Socialists of America
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Chattanooga Democratic Socialists of America

item.title: Socialist Sunday: Winter Social
item.description: Help us organize a year-end party and ring in one whole year of democratic socialism in Chattanooga.

item.title: Socialism! Anarchism! Communism! Socialist Sundays
item.description: The left is full of jargon and political theory. We’ll break it down and explain it bit by bit.

item.title: Reading Reconstruction America
item.description: For this discussion weâ€™re going to be reading The Wars of Reconstruction, by Douglas R. Egerton

item.title: October 2017 General Meeting
item.description: This meeting we’re going to be talking about Socialist Sundays Disability Awareness Medicare For All and more!

item.title: September Socialist Sunday Taillight Clinic
item.description: Description Following the example set by New Orleans DSA, we decided to put on a taillight clinic and serve the people of Chattanooga by replacing taillights for free. We’ll be out there for a few hours starting at 2pm. Tell everyone you know!
